metadata.title: CVE-2024-11706 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference may have inadvertently occurred in `pk12util`,and specifically in the `SEC_ASN1DecodeItem_Util` function, when handlingmalformed or improperly formatted input files. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 133 and Thunderbird < 133.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
